name: Event Planning and Coordination
description: Comprehensive event planning, venue selection, logistics coordination, and project management for tech and gaming events.

name: Live Streaming
description: Professional live streaming solutions to broadcast tech and gaming events to a wider virtual audience.

name: eSports Tournaments
description: Organize and manage eSports tournaments, including game selection, player registration, and match scheduling.

name: Tech Workshops
description: Hands-on tech workshops covering coding, software development, hardware, and emerging technologies.

name: Vendor and Exhibitor Management
description: Complete vendor and exhibitor management services for trade shows and expos, including booth assignments and logistics.

name: Hackathon Events
description: Organize hackathons, competitive coding events, with themes, sponsors, registrations, and a productive atmosphere.
